name: Pause Witch
description:
You are a little witch, who fell from her broom.  you need to find new powers to get your broom back.

I wanted to try to do a platformer with a "pause to change power"

for now the game is really short... like less than 2 minutes to complete I think. it's really to test out things, but I will update it... someday.

feel free to give feedback !
